name: Lift Off (itch) (Gresse)
description:
Hey there, 

This is a 2D model rocket simulator in which you can customized your own rocket and explore world of rocket science. In rhis simulator you can learn how your performance of your rocket changes if adjust these different vraiables of your rocket:

-fuel amount

-engine nozzle diameter

-parachute size

-fin size

-fairing size

-fuel type (comming soon)

-materials (comming soon)
